alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Clarke; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 15 at 9:39AM CST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam affecting Clarke, Choctaw and Washington Counties. For the Tombigbee River...including Coffeeville Dam, Leroy...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River Near Coffeeville Dam. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, pastureland becomes flooded. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. Old Ferry Road near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 32.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CST Wednesday was 32.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 32.7 feet tomorrow morning and remain near that level through the weekend. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
